article: a pentagon investigation of reported harassment by christian cadets and teachers found that the u.s. air force academy had failed to accommodate people of non-christian beliefs but had not engaged in `` overt religious discrimination , '' a report released wednesday said .
abstract: lack of guidelines is unk to religious intolerance at academy
